analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive black hole theme with animated objects and slides. The existing CSS and HTML files need to be updated to incorporate a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The theme should include interactive planets, animated slides, and a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the theme is cohesive and visually appealing.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript file to include functionality for animated slides and interactive elements. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, and add event listeners for the new buttons added in the HTML file.
